channel.title: Damn The Man, Save The Music
channel.description:
It has been too long since the facilitator camp without actually facilitating a game. Time to go through the long list of games I have never played but want to try out.
First up, "Damn The Man, Save The Music", a Kickstarted story-game about saving a 90's record store, hopefully with many disasters along the way.
[date=2020-03-13 time=08:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="Australia/Perth"] → [date=2020-03-13 time=11:30:00 format="LLLL" timezone="Australia/Perth"] [Damn The Man](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-M0fGS3qnh2qDevCOdvX)
The game will be taught as we play and will hopefully be recorded on Streamyard but only released if all players agree.
**Safety tools** : We will be using the X-card & lines and veils. We can change these tools to whatever suits the table best. This game follows [The Gauntlet’s Code of Conduct](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/community-code-of-conduct.html).

item.title: Damn The Man, Save The Music
item.dc:creator: @cordinc
item.description:
@cordinc wrote:

It has been too long since the facilitator camp without actually facilitating a game. Time to go through the long list of games I have never played but want to try out.

First up, “Damn The Man, Save The Music”, a Kickstarted story-game about saving a 90’s record store, hopefully with many disasters along the way.

Friday, March 13, 2020 12:00 AM → Friday, March 13, 2020 3:30 AM Damn The Man

The game will be taught as we play and will hopefully be recorded on Streamyard but only released if all players agree.

Safety tools : We will be using the X-card & lines and veils. We can change these tools to whatever suits the table best. This game follows The Gauntlet’s Code of Conduct.
